entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:05 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 09:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
